name: Sega Superstars
description:
Sega Superstars is a casual action-arcade game developed by Sonic Team. On review aggregator Metacritic, Sega Superstars has a score of 72. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Sega Superstars on PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Yuji Naka. It was directed by Yoshihisa Hashimoto.
